data.description: publish a timeline on the web in HTML
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module uses HTML::Table as the basis for a perl class which
    allows one to generate the classic timeline look. Since this
    generates HTML, it seemed only fitting to use that prefix. As far as
    I can tell, no one has written an HTML timeline generator, though I
    think that I have seen one that generates timelines with the GD
    library.
